Header.title: TBSA
Header.paragraph: Trent Business Stuent's association is a student run levy-group at Trent University which is catered to the business majors at Trent University

About.paragraph: Since 1998, the Trent Business Students Association (TBSA) has connected academic learning with real-world business experiences at Trent University. We empower future business leaders by creating opportunities beyond the classroom for students to develop leadership skills, build professional networks, and explore various business disciplines. TBSA has established strong relationships with industry professionals, alumni, and faculty, providing students with mentorship and career connections. We're committed to building a vibrant community where students form lasting relationships and discover new opportunities. As the voice of business students at Trent, we continuously adapt to meet the evolving needs of the business landscape, creating pathways for students to achieve their goals and turn ambitions into reality.
